Package index

Load Data

Download and load corpora from OSF

load_campaign_booklet()
Load the South Korean Election Campaign Booklet corpus
load_party_statements()
Load the South Korean Party Statements corpus
download_data()
Download krpoltext datasets from OSF

Explore and Filter

Inspect metadata and filter documents

metadata()
Retrieve dataset metadata
get_docs()
Query documents from a krpoltext corpus

Integration

Convert to other formats

as_quanteda_corpus()
Convert a krpoltext data.table to a quanteda corpus

Cache Management

clear_cache()
Clear cached datasets
